Text.val: 27.08.2014 AS SCR#19068 Calling CV2 version of ICA908 now
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
18.05.2007 SH SCR12549 BPH254L Added module to set INVU_FINALPAYMENTDATE =
null if INVU_AMOUNT <> 0 after the update in BPH259
21.04.2006 SH SCR10997 Added call to BPH259 to handle BPH254L updates
19.08.2004 SH SCR6863 BPH254K Added test if there are remaining invoices and
reduces IMQH_NOM with -1 for each deleted IMQD row
03.06.2004 SH SCR6339 BPH254J Module will not performed if BPIV_BTCH_BATCHCODE=M
26.05.2004 SH SCR6248 BPH254L Set INVU_FINALPAYMENTDATE = GNRL_ACTIVEDATE
if INVU_AMOUNT = 0 after the specified update
16.04.2004 BPH254L Added new parameter PI.BPIV_AMOUNTCURRINV and update INVU
- rows with INVU_AMOUNT- PI_AMOUNTCURRINV and if INVU_AMOUNT = 0 all rows will
- be deleted then
22.01.2003 Changed remarks and task titles according to specy
11.12.2002 SH Changed CND to PI.INVO_AACTUALI <= 0 for delete IDUN
and call BPH254M
02.12.2002 SCR2607 SH BPH254M Update IDSP_DATSOLVEDDISPUTES with
- GNRL_ACTIVEDATE instead of GNRL_ACTIVEDAY, changed parameter PI.ACTIVEDATE
19.11.2002 JJ SCR2556 changed check on final payment date to use not(isnull())
09.09.2002 SCR2114 SH Only if INVO_IDSP_NO > 0 obtain INVOICE_DISPUTE, added
- new part if INVO_IDSP_NO > 0 and INVOICE_DISPUTE was obtained: Obtain all
- IMQD rows with INVO_IDSP_NO and call ICA908 to delete them --> BPH254M
-- If batchcode = "Moved invoices" do not delete IDUN rows, this will be
handeld in BPH254D
-- BPH254L - Delete INVOICE_UNBOOKED
... set INVU_FINALPAYMENTDATE = null if INVU_AMOUNT <> 0 after the update in
BPH259
.. only if there are no more invoices exists
-- The actual handled INVO row in BPH254, see calling program, has not to be
selected for the test, because at this level the updates of the current INVO
row are not written to database
-- Reduce IMQH_NOM - 1 of related header file, for every deleted detail row
